name: Gravity Maze (No Gravity Games)
description:
Gravity Maze is an addictive 3D puzzle game with unique mechanics of... gravity control!

Your task is to place the red cube in the desired place. 
The only force that moves your cube is...the overwhelming gravity.
Now it is your turn to take control of it and tame the gravity!

When you rotate the cube, everything falls down... Aaaaaaaarghhhh...!!!!

So...plan your moves carefully to avoid obstacles, use other blocks and lead your red square to the target!

Seems simple, doesn't it?
It quickly gets you into and makes it more and more complicated...
Can you face it?

FEATURES:
🔄45 addictive and mind-twisting levels.
🔄Special blocks (metal, stone, glass, glue, balloon) of unique characteristics to make it all far more crazy!
🔄Special mode to preview the full level.
🔄No time limit!
